GSD.description:
phonet/pep: refuse to enable an unbound pipe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.260 by commit 311601f114859d586d5ef8833d60d3aa23282161. For more details please see the references link.
